place.name: SPOTT
place.gazetteerText: Spott, par. and vil., Haddingtonshire - par., 7583 ac., pop. 579; vil., 3 miles S. of Dunbar; Spott House, seat, is in vicinity. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
